```{r, echo=FALSE}
library(sp)
library(rgdal)
p1 = Polygon(data.frame(x=c(0, 0, 1000, 1000, 0), y=c(0, 1000, 1000, 0, 0)))
h1 = Polygon(data.frame(x=c(430.7, 219, 233.9, 305.8, 338.2, 378.6, 434.8, 566.1, 757.5, 824.1, 769.2, 743, 684.3, 556.2, 430.7), y=c(195.2, 285.5, 551, 697.3, 742.4, 781.6, 818.4, 839, 744.8, 488.5, 375.5, 345.4, 303.5, 237.1, 195.2)), hole=TRUE)
p2 = Polygon(data.frame(x=c(438, 414.3, 383.5, 374.6, 357.6, 368.4, 395.5, 471, 516.2, 636.8, 671.1, 651.1, 564.1, 525.2, 438), y=c(343.5, 366.1, 429.6, 454.3, 507.7, 563.2, 594, 627, 644.7, 577.1, 502.4, 417.9, 375.7, 358, 343.5)))
h2 = Polygon(data.frame(x=c(464.2, 444.3, 428.9, 421.6, 464.3, 539.1, 580.9, 586.1, 574.8, 530, 464.2), y=c(418.4, 445.6, 473, 508.6, 592.9, 577.1, 502.7, 491.7, 472.2, 420.3, 418.4)), hole=TRUE)
p3 = Polygon(data.frame(x=c(482.9, 467.1, 465.9, 484.6, 494.1, 496.3, 508.4, 519.8, 532.8, 520.8, 515.6, 482.9), y=c(461.5, 495.2, 506.5, 528.5, 528.6, 528.2, 526.3, 521.6, 499.3, 479.8, 473.1, 461.5)))

ps = Polygons(list(p1,h1,p2,h2,p3), ID=1)
sp = SpatialPolygons(list(ps))

par(mar=c(4,4,1,1))
plot(sp, axes=TRUE, col="lightgrey")
points(poly_coords(sp), pch=16)
```
